title: Gerri
overview: Thirty-five years old, with deep eyes and a shifty demeanour, Gregorio Esposito, known as Gerri, is an inspector of Roma origin who solves cases under the Puglia sun. Charming, restless, and with a mysterious past, he throws himself headlong into investigations, incurring the ire of the chief of the squad and the affection of his colleagues.
